mapper.select: SELECT t.id task_id, t.title title, t.description description, t.expiration_date expiration_date, t.status status FROM tasks t JOIN users_tasks ut on t.id = ut.task_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasks(title, description, expiration_date, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{expirationDate}, #{status})
